items.sentence: Tom and John moved to Boston with their wives.
Tom stayed after class to talk to the teacher.
Tom stayed home from work because he was sick.
Tom stopped the car and turned off the engine.
Tom stretched out on the sofa and fell asleep.
I took this picture in Boston on October 20th.
There are many problems for them to deal with.
Tom couldn\'t go swimming because he was sick.
Tom couldn\'t help overhearing what Mary said.
Tom couldn\'t remember what Mary had told him.
